name: Escape Yellow
description:
Destroy the aggressive creatures and escape the ship using a beam between you and the droid powered by its own AI!!!

TUTORIAL - IMPORTANT - INFO ABOUT THE CURSOR!!! - READ!!!

Move with WASD.

PRESS left mouse button to choose a command for the droid. THE CURSOR WILL APPEAR. MOVE IT towards the point you want the droid to go to. Then RELEASE. Example: hover over door, release it, then the droid will open the door.

Point at the droid to cancel the choice of command. The available command count can be seen inside a blue circle above the droid. When given no commands, the droid will use its own AI!

Press right mouse button to enable the weapon!

Enjoy!

Known problems:

- When chased by creatures, the droid may end up going into the wall and get "eaten". Nothing you can do about it :( Just be fast enough to protect the droid! :)

- Sometimes the doors (especially the one after the control room) won't open, and the droid goes somewhere else... Restart and try again?

- Texts disappear too quickly. It's ok if you read them one by one. Just don't rush.

- It's not "click" the mouse button, but "press" it
